title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other GGUF models locally with one command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, browsers, and edge runtimes.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models programmatically.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama as an LLM and chat model for chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama—chat history, multi-model convos, document upload, RAG, admin panel.

title: chainlit-ollama
summary: Chainlit integration that lets you build shareable, interactive chat apps backed by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG template using Ollama embeddings + LlamaIndex to chat with local PDFs and notes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like pair-programmer.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama—chat, generate, pull, list, delete models with fluent builders.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri desktop app for chatting with Ollama models offline; macOS, Linux, Windows builds.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder for production pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using any local Ollama model; slash commands & threads.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package wrapping the Ollama REST API—install with `npm i ollama`.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package—`pip install ollama`—for chatting, generating, and embedding with local models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama—chat, generate, pull, and delete models from Go apps.
